defaultSeo.metaTitle: The photographical musings of Nikita Kozlov
defaultSeo.metaDescription:
What if the truth didn‚Äôt hurt‚Äîafter all, the truth is all there is, and yet the world remains a beautiful place if you choose to see it that way, silky in its refinement yet truthful enough to be uncomfortable.

Silky light drapes the world in delicate, exotic threads, luxurious to the eye yet secretly strong, so smooth and lustrous that even the hard edges of truth begin to soften. In that glimmer, the genuine and authentic emerge. An irreplaceable shimmer that feels soothing on the surface yet substantive at its core, ultimately liberating us to see beauty without closing our eyes.

attributes.title: Oregon Country Fair üçë 2024
attributes.description: Oregon Country Fair 2024 shot on film & digital.
attributes.content:
I've been going to the Oregon Country Fair üçë for 20 years now, and this year I consciously tried to capture the magic through my lens. I also made a deliberate choice to focus more on portraits rather than candids or wide shots. I love how portraits hack into our brain's natural response to seeing faces and bringing out emotion.

Too scared to get my R5 C super dusty, I brought a DSLR hand-me-down Nikon that I got from my sister instead. This camera was my first interchangeable lens camera, and it opened this whole world to me. I also brought my trusty FM2 35mm film camera. The DSLR did not disappoint‚ÄîI forgot how much battery life you got with those early models. I set it to aperture priority and wandered off into the Eight.

To add a twist to shooting on film, I bought a bag of expired film from a local antique store. I was especially excited to shoot a roll of 1000 ISO Kodak color 35mm film I found, which is no longer made.

Bubbles at dawn is one of my favorite parts of the fair. I shot a whole roll of film at the sunrise congregation of diehards, lofty sparkle ponies, cat girls, and psychonauts. üåû A huge shoutout to my homies for making it so much fun, and also to the crew that brought out fresh oysters ü¶™ and champagne to pop bottles during sunrise! üçæ üí´

attributes.title: Mixtape Meetup
attributes.description: A curated collection of rad cars, bikes and boards along with cool demos by BMX riders and skateboarders, all inside Avant-Garde Collection's huge warehouse.
attributes.content:
Mixtape was the mashup we needed...
